data.name: GRAAG
data.detailed_description:
GRAAG is a roguelike collection adventure with ASCII graphics. Explore the nature and the abandoned buildings, collect samples of animals, plants and technology, and find out what happened to the world!

Features:
  • ASCII graphics with turn-based gameplay
  • Procedurally generated world with forests, lakes, and buildings you can go into
  • Dozens of animals, plants, rocks, and others!
  • Collect fur and blood samples from animals, leaf and berry samples from plants and more!
  • Gain skills to take better quality samples, and reduce the chances of animals attacking you
  • Find clothes to shield yourself from the elements and the animals
  • Drop off the samples to prove yourself, and get harder assignments in return.

A pandemic has most of the world under lockdown, but your remote tribe has been able to evade the worst of it. A mysterious person seeks you out, and you are to travel through nature and abandoned laboratories and factories to take samples of everything you can find, in order to help cure the disease.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
